page.title: 14Reading Aggregates
page.content: Can only work 7.30a.m._5p.m. Monday to Friday.{Working area}to be continually watered to keep dust down. 5 acres only to be worked at one time. Heap of top soil removed must not be more than 3m high. Under the soil a layer of unwanted material called{overburden}is removed. It is replaced when the gravel has been excavated. One crane (navvy) works from the centre of the pit loading the dump trucks with gravel. It is moved 3 times a day within the pit area.{Raw ballast}is unloaded into a hopper. It is washed to remove the sand which is sold to builders. The gravel is graded into sizes. 1. Shingle < 10mm diameter 2. Gravel < 20mm diameter 3. Gravel < 40mm diameter The remainder sold for hole filling. {Gravel workings }are common in Berks. Many have{recreational uses}afterwards
